nodes.text: The San Tekka conglomerate was a corporation owned by the San Tekka clan, a family who had gained influence by the time of the High Republic Era for their work as hyperspace prospectors. The conglomerate often advertised for settlers to move to out-of-the-way planets, rewarding them for their labor in constructing local infrastructure. The corporation had an office on the capital planet Coruscant and operated on the planet Tiikae.
